string-array.name: library_desc
string-array.item: Library for working with real-world HTML. It provides a very convenient API for extracting and manipulating data, using the best of DOM, CSS, and jquery-like methods.
ButterKnife is a view "injection" library for Android which uses annotation processing to generate boilerplate code for you.
The MaterialDrawer library aims to provide a quick and easy Activity to create and implement a drawer layout in your application.
This library let you apply custom fonts to your android projects.
Material-ripple allows to add ripple effect wrapper for Android views.
Material-dialogs library allows you to use a consistently Material themed dialog on all versions of Android, along with specific customizations that make it easier to brand the dialog.
Materialish-progress is a material style progress wheel compatible with 2.3.
An alternative to default spinners in android with a sweet touch of material design.
